Articles.Content:
So I was messing around with rotate and offset and I managed to make a floating part and I looked around for a good 0.5 seconds to see if anyone else has mentioned this and I didn't find anything so I decided to say something (so please don't hurt me if this has been brought up before but I will continue to speak of it as if it hasn't)

So anyways if you were to place a part and rotate it 180 and then use offset to drag it the desired distance away then re-rotate it back to it's original position then you get a floating part, it still functions as if it were attached have lift for wings and getting fuel for engines and you can make some pretty cool stuff with it like I made a pretty cool looking plane but i'm to dumb/lazy to figure out how to put an image and not have it be about the size of Africa.

I'd love to see some cool stuff done with this so have fun. (still under the assumption that it hasn't been mentioned before if not then please direct me to cool ship town)
It's cool isn't it?

So I was messing around with rotate and offset and I managed to make a floating part and I looked around for a good 0.5 seconds to see if anyone else has mentioned this and I didn't find anything so I decided to say something (so please don't hurt me if this has been brought up before but I will continue to speak of it as if it hasn't)

So anyways if you were to place a part and rotate it 180 and then use offset to drag it the desired distance away then re-rotate it back to it's original position then you get a floating part, it still functions as if it were attached have lift for wings and getting fuel for engines and you can make some pretty cool stuff with it like I made a pretty cool looking plane but i'm to dumb/lazy to figure out how to put an image and not have it be about the size of Africa.

I'd love to see some cool stuff done with this so have fun. (still under the assumption that it hasn't been mentioned before if not then please direct me to cool ship town)

Cool ship town is right this way ----> http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/20-The-Spacecraft-Exchange
welp it's been discovered before I had a moment of pure excitement and now I have a moment of pure stupidity. I love you Kerbal community.
also easier ways to floating parts exist.
I'm on my phone so can't post pictures. Pod racers!
